thread.title: Shocking! 3 cars mysteriously catch fire nearby Amitabh Bachchan’s Juhu bungalow – watch video
thread.title_full: Shocking! 3 cars mysteriously catch fire nearby Amitabh Bachchan’s Juhu bungalow – watch video

author: Pooja Nayak
title: Shocking! 3 cars mysteriously catch fire nearby Amitabh Bachchan’s Juhu bungalow – watch video
text:
Amitabh Bachchan spends a day with grandchildren Navya and Agastya and their pictures are definitely adorable 
In a shocking turn of events, 3 cars caught fire nearby Amitabh Bachchan’s Juhu residence this afternoon. Yes, a video of the same is going viral on the internet where you can see all three cars charred in fire in a parking lot which lies in the same vicinity as Amitabh’s Juhu bungalow. As per reports, the incident took place around 7:30 am near the Kelavani Masturi Kundangar Manharlal Girl’s Hostel situated on Parulekar Road, Sainath Nagar in Vile Parle West. The hostel is located exactly opposite of Utpal Shanghvi School, and is in the same area as Juhu PVR and Amitabh Bachchan’s bungalow Pratiksha. 
Although no casualties have been reported in this fire case but it’s quite suspicious how the cars caught fire all of sudden. Turns out the blaze originated from a maroon Tata Indica stationed alongside other parked cars near the footpath.Cops arrived at the spot within ten minutes, whereas the fire department, with one fire engine and one water tanker, arrived at the spot roughly 15 minutes after the fire broke out. The fire was was curtailed within minutes and no one was injured. According to an onlooker, there was a minor delay in dousing the fire owing to an issue with the fire department’s equipment. The Indica, City and Octavia were completely charred in the blaze, whereas damage was restricted to the boot of the i10. 
Here, watch the video below: Fire nr PVR juhu. Police arrvd in 5 min, Fire Brigd in 15min. Aftr arrvng fire equip was nt wrkng @timesofindia @RidlrMUM @MumbaiMirror pic.twitter.com/AORDh9rT0y 
— Viranchi Purohit (@biranji) February 27, 2017 
We wonder if Amitabh Bachchan is even aware of this mishap considering it happened much away from his residence. Keep watching this space for latest updates on this story. Published: February 27, 2017 4:45 pm Topics:
